body:

title: Support VM Reuse with Different Compiled Code
body:
Add `RunCode` method to `vm.VirtualMachine` to enable running multiple compiled code objects on a single VM, improving performance and state management for sequential script execution.

Relates to: https://github.com/risor-io/risor/issues/374
